title: About me
raw:
---
title: About me
---
##### 1nd Year PhD Student

I am currently a Ph.D student in [ICDM Lab](https://www.icdmlab.com/) at [University of Electronic Science and Technology of China(UESTC)](https://en.uestc.edu.cn/), and supervised by Prof. [Fan Zhou](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Ihj2Rw8AAAAJ&hl=en). My research interests include but are not limited to topology deep learning and traffic analysis.

Prior to this, I obtained a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Technology from [Fujian Normal University](https://www.fjnu.edu.cn/main.htm) in 2024.

Email: o2cator at gmail.com

[[Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=V4glG5oAAAAJ&hl=zh-CN)]  [[Github](https://github.com/Captaincobe)]



# News
